duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a thorough repair plan for each vehicle, ensuring compliance with OEM/Industry Standard Guidelines.
Thoroughly disassemble, repair, and reassemble each vehicle, delivering safe and quality automotive repairs.
Repair collision-damaged vehicles according to OEM specifications and company standards, including Alldata, I-CAR, and the WOW Operating Way.
Attend/collaborate with the team during daily production meetings to stay updated with the repair process.
Stay up to date with required I-Car and Company Safety Training to ensure compliance with industry standards.
Manage all vehicles assigned and deliver high-quality work with attention to detail.
Other duties as assigned by the management team.
